block.p: A sports article on Thursday about the sale of naming rights for the Nets' planned home in Brooklyn referred imprecisely to the arena's anticipated cost. Although the price will indeed exceed $550 million, the latest cost projection has raised it to about $637 million. The article also referred incompletely to a park planned atop the arena. It will be a private open space for the complex; it will not be a public park.
